top_stories.title: Semiconductor Leader Taps Articul8 to Speed Product Releases
top_stories.description: Articul8’s domain-specific GenAI platform, running on Google Cloud, helps a top semiconductor leader accelerate complex product development workflows with high-precision, multimodal intelligence. Articul8, the leader in domain-specific Generative AI (GenAI) for enterprises and regulated industries, today announced the successful deployment of its enterprise GenAI platform with a leading semiconductor company... The post Semiconductor Leader Taps Articul8 to Speed Product Releases first appeared...

top_stories.title: NVIDIA Unveils Multi-Agent Intelligent Warehouse and Catalog Enrichment AI Blueprints to Power the Retail Pipeline
top_stories.description: Every “that was easy” shopping moment is made possible by teams working to hit shipping deadlines, scrambling to fix missing product details and striving to provide curated shopping experiences. Behind the scenes, workers are dealing with the reality of aging systems, siloed data and rising customer expectations — a combination that makes consistency and speed Read Article

top_stories.title: NVIDIA Brings GeForce RTX Gaming to More Devices With New GeForce NOW Apps for Linux PC and Amazon Fire TV
top_stories.description: Announced at the CES trade show running this week in Las Vegas, NVIDIA is bringing more devices, more games and more ways to play to its GeForce NOW cloud gaming service.
